text: Morning, Mom! Just got to the office. It's going to be a busy day with back-to-back meetings. I have a lunch meeting with Michael Brown to discuss his W2 and earnings report. He's had a significant increase in his wages this year due to his promotion, so we'll be adjusting his financial plan accordingly. I'll tell you all about it later!
Yes, I sent it last week. She should get it any day now. Thanks for the reminder, Mom!
